title: Hystar Executive Series | Made from an Innovative Linen Fabric | 5mm Thick, Smooth Stitched Edges, and Natural Rubber Base (Ash Gray)
description: Timeless Design: Popular colors that complement all professional setups. Designed as both a desk protector and a minimalist addition to any desk setup. Better Than Felt: Made of a premium linen fabric. This desk mat offers a smoother texture compared to irritating felt. Made to Last: Features a smooth, color-matched, stitched edge. Robust 5mm thickness. The large design improves comfort and durability. Ideal for long sessions and frequent use. Stable and Reliable: The odorless natural rubber base keeps this minimal desk pad securely in place. Use as a stable writing mat or mouse surface. Professional Design: Includes a branded leather tag and a matching coaster to complete the classy look.
